pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with provincial and territorial leaders | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, spoke with Premiers from the provinces and territories to exchange views on a number of important federal – provincial and territorial issues.

In particular, they reiterated the importance of the Canada – U.S. relationship and discussed the opportunities presented by the new Administration.

The First Ministers looked forward to further discussions and working together across a range of issues.
